recipe_name: Pan-fried smoked salmon with radish salad
author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat a frying pan and fry the salmon slices on one side for two minutes. Remove from the pan and keep warm. Place the grated radishes into a large bowl. Place the orange juice, oil, dill and vinegar into a small bowl and whisk to combine. Pour the dressing over the radishes and stir well. To serve, place the salmon slices onto serving plates with the radish salad.
ingredients: 4 slices smoked salmon,  1 bunch radishes, tops removed, grated,  1 orange, juice only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp chopped fresh dill,  2 tsp white wine vinegar
